features: Kills 99.9% of bacteria detergents leave behind
body.description: Our clothes are in constant contact with bacteria throughout our day-to-day activities, for example through contact with contaminated surfaces, other people and our own bodies. Bacteria can spread from one fabric to another in the laundry basket, from the washing-machine drum to the next load. Some of these bacteria can survive following the wash cycle. When it comes to certain laundry loads such as children's clothes or sportswear, you want to eliminate bacteria that may cause illnesses and create lingering bad smells. But detergents alone don't actually kill all bacteria. Introducing Lysol Laundry Sanitizer free & Clear, an additive specially designed to kill 99.9% of bacteria in laundry when used as directed. Lysol Laundry Sanitizer free & Clear is free from fragrance and free from dye. Simply add Lysol Laundry Sanitizer to your rinse cycle. It does not contain any chlorine bleach and even works in cold water so is safe to use on most fabrics including whites, colors and darks.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Lysol Laundry Sanitizer Additive, Free & Clear Our clothes are in constant contact with bacteria throughout our day-to-day activities, for example through contact with contaminated surfaces, other people and our own bodies. Bacteria can spread from one fabric to another in the laundry basket, from the washing-machine drum to the next load. Some of these bacteria can survive following the wash cycle. When it comes to certain laundry loads such as children's clothes or sportswear, you want to eliminate bacteria that may cause illnesses and create lingering bad smells. But detergents alone don't actually kill all bacteria. Introducing Lysol Laundry Sanitizer, an additive specially designed to kill 99.9% of bacteria in laundry. Simply add Lysol Laundry Sanitizer to your rinse cycle. It does not contain any chlorine bleach and even works in cold water so is safe to use on most fabrics including whites, colors and darks. Features Fragrance Free Dye Free Chlorine Bleach Free Gentle on fabrics Keep your favorite scent without compromising eliminating bacteria

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing Free & Clear Product
reviews.reviewText: I love that they have a free and clear version of this! I love that I can use it with any laundry detergent and that it does not compete with the other scents. This works great on my bathroom towels and rugs and it helps during cold and flu season. I have this on my subscribe and save and look forward to receiving it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars No extra odors, no damage to clothes
reviews.reviewText: Assuming this is disinfecting like it claims, this stuff is awesome! I’ve use it on a variety of garments without any issues. I love that I can do a cold wash and deal with bacteria buildup on workout clothes that can’t go in the dryer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Seems to solve 2 problems!
reviews.reviewText: Not only do the clothes smell good, but the washing machine smells a LOT better as well. I use tub wash as required, but it does not seems to cut the odor, but this seems to solve that issue. I am impressed, and I can definitely tell the difference when I remove the clothes from the washer. Bonus: the elimination of germs! To me, this a great buy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best disinfectant for clothes and linens
reviews.reviewText: I use this for washing my linens and bath towels. They smell great after being laundered. I have used this for the past year and will continue. It’s also great for when gym clothes are ready to be washed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A MUST for laundry if you have an athlete!
reviews.reviewText: This is so good! It's perfect for my son's sports clothes. Helps the whole was so we don't have to wash his things separately.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love this product because it has no scent. I have to use a shared laundry and it grosses me out. I love this product but one bottle arrived sealed shut solid, the second one was leaking. Not sure how much I lost but it wasn’t significant. I would do autoship, but leakage is risky.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I use this product, since my skin is sensitive, and I can't use any product with dye anyway, but I get my products late anyway
